root.comment: Styles applied to the root element.

contained.comment: Styles applied to the root element if variant is contained.

label.comment: Styles applied to the element that wraps the button children.

fontSize.comment: Default button font size can vary depending on platform.

sizeMedium.comment: Styles applied to the root element if size is medium.

fontWeight.comment: Medium button labels have semi bold font weight

sizeLarge.comment: Styles applied to the root element if size is large.

fontWeight.comment: Large button labels have bold font weight
